column4: revilodraw-->  sudo touch /forcefsck  .. do that and ree-boot.. puts things in order... granted .. bugs show up.. wait 5 mins after boot to do anything.. let things  become order.. and ur bios catch on.. I know.. ive installed ubuntu 100 times ok?.. tx
